hero.title_start: The Fastest Way to Pay at
hero.description: Scan, Split, and Pay in 10 seconds. No waiting for the bill, no app download required. Seamless integration for modern dining.

how_it_works.title: How it Works
how_it_works.step1_desc: Simply scan the QR code at your table with your phone camera. No apps to download or accounts to create.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Pay just your share or treat your friends. Custom split options make group dining effortless and fair.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Payment is instant. No waiting for card machines or paper receipts. Just pay and go.

restaurants.feat1_desc: Eliminate the 15-minute average wait for the bill, allowing you to serve more guests per shift.
restaurants.feat2_desc: Pre-calculated tip options and seamless digital payments encourage higher gratuity for your team.
restaurants.feat3_desc: Diversify revenue streams with built-in pickup and ordering capabilities managed from one dashboard.

diners.title: The Best Dining Experience
diners.feat2_desc: Instantly emailed or saved to your gallery.
diners.feat3_desc: Guest checkout is the default standard.
diners.feat4_desc: Earn rewards automatically with every scan.
